Detailed Description

Access and modify table, index, foreign key, and sequence definitions stored in an ITTIA DB SQL database.

Member Enumeration Documentation

◆ SchemaConflictPolicy

enum storage::ittiadb::Catalog::SchemaConflictPolicy

Policy to resolve schema conflicts.

Enumerator
RejectExisting 

Expect no existing schema objects with conflicting names.

SkipExisting 

Skip existing schema objects with conflicting names.

DropExisting 

Drop existing schema objects with conflicting names.
